CustomField.description: When checked, system will retry this payment in GoCardless that has been failed because of specific reasons (insufficient funds). You can retry a failed payment for 3 times. Default Unchecked.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: When checked, system will retry this payment in GoCardless that has been failed because of specific reasons (insufficient funds). You can retry a failed payment for 3 times. Default Unchecked.
CustomField.label: Retry Payment in GoCardless
